item.title: Using Federated learning for detecting malware in IoT network context.
item.author: happynguyen1902@gmail.com (thunebae)
item.description: Federated learning It is decentralized machine learning, where the server sends the initialization model to the clients, then the client uses the global model to train with their own data and then their local model onto the server. The server will aggregate these local models using the aggregation algorithm. H√¨nh 1: Federated learning diagram In my project Model: using MLP 2-layer (115,2) algorithm for training model Aggregation algorithm at server: FedAVG (recipe below)
item.dc:creator: thunebae

item.title: CarePlus
item.author: happynguyen1902@gmail.com (thunebae)
item.description: Framework: Django with python Idea: Create a website to manage F0 patient at home (This project was created when my team must study at home because of Social distancing during covid epidemic) Feature: ‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING: CarePlus has many bugs, omissions, incomplete functions. But my team has too lazy to fix and complete it For all users: sign in, log out, edit profile (edit picture profile), health declaration H√¨nh 1: Update profile Only for doctor: add patient by identity card number (it’s only show in patient profile and only doctor knows it), classify patient (warning level: blue (it’s fine.

item.title: ECC Aplication
item.author: happynguyen1902@gmail.com (thunebae)
item.description: Framework: Python with PyQt5-tools Idea It’s application just for demo (without communication through internet). For the purpose of preventing scores from leaking at server, we use AES-128 mode CBC to encrypt the data of the database and the AES key will be encrypted and exchanged by ECC. Implement H√¨nh 1: UEIIS project graph When a teacher or student logs in, the public key will be downloaded from the server and use for decrypting ciphertext to score table.
item.dc:creator: thunebae

item.title: Malware assignment
item.author: happynguyen1902@gmail.com (thunebae)
item.description: Framework: pefile python Ex1 - File Infecting Virus üìë CHALL 1: Add a new sectiion in pe file or use .reloc section to contain virus (Simple MessageBox). When program start, call virus first and program run normally. Honestly it’s not a virus, it’s not contagious. It’s just an experiment on inject pe file. Maybe If I has more time to do, I think I can make it…umh contagiousüò≥ üìë CHALL 2: Call hijacking - Like challenge before, but somewhere call instruction in .

item.title: TechBlog
item.author: happynguyen1902@gmail.com (thunebae)
item.description: Introduction Umh…TechBlog is Technology plus Blog, so everybody can write and share their knowledges in this website Server: Linux‚Äã LAMP stack: Apache2, PHP, Mysql‚Äã MVC Framework‚Äã Program languages: PHP, HTML Feature Register, log in, log out, update profile Create, update, delete, view posts, pagination Comment, count views Upload images H√¨nh 1: Home UI Security method Prepared statement: prevent SQL injection SANITIZE INPUT PHP: prevent XSS Mode_rewrite: protect resources, prevent directory traversal
